Hi all I am using the following code to render the url of the language switcher:
``` {% for translation in content.translated_content %}
<a
                    href="{{ translation.absoluteUrl }}"
                    class="block"
                    role="menuitem"
                  >
...```
But it adds a ?hsLang=de at the end even though it links to the english variation. Any way to delete that?
Thanks a ton
is there an easy way to get blog tag ids in the HubSpot UI?
Yes, go to settings -> domains & URLs -> language settings -> Enable language specific redirects -> OFF
